meanings.definition: A person or thing that paves.
meanings.sent1: The diligent pavers worked hard to create a smooth path.
meanings.sent2: The city hired skilled pavers to repair the road.
meanings.sent3: The little pavers in the toy construction set were busy fixing the miniature road.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like that of a paver, steadily laying the foundation for success.
meanings.sent5: The pavers in the garden seemed to whisper stories of the paths they had paved.

meanings.definition: A brick, tile, stone, or block used for paving.
meanings.sent1: The garden path was made of beautiful pavers that gleamed in the sunlight.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers unloaded a truck full of heavy pavers for the sidewalk.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel hid its acorn under one of the pavers in the patio.
meanings.sent4: Each paver in the mosaic represented a unique story in the history of the town.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pavers transformed the dull courtyard into a vibrant space.
